import React from 'react' import './Header.scss' import Logo from '../../Assets/Logo.svg' import {auth} from '../../Firebase/FirebaseUtils' import CartIcon from '../CartIcon/CartIcon' import CartDropDown from '../Cart/CartDropDown' import { selectCartHidden } from '../../Redux/cart/cart-selectors' import { selectCurrentUser } from '../../Redux/User/user-selector' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' const Header = ({ currentUser, hidden }) => (
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}> SIGN OUT
) : ( SIGN IN )}
{hidden ? null : }
); const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ currentUser: selectCurrentUser, hidden: selectCartHidden }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
